patthana24.19:4.1: Nasaraṇo nasappaccayo dhammo araṇassa sappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana24.19:6.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nasanidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo sanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.19:6.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana24.19:7.1: Nasaraṇo naanidassano dhammo saraṇassa anidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana24.19:7.2: Nasaraṇo naanidassano dhammo araṇassa anidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana24.19:7.4: Ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā ekaṃ, upanissaye purejāte atthiyā avigate dve.
patthana24.19:8.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.19:8.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … aññamaññe ekaṃ … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana24.19:9.1: Nasaraṇaṃ naappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.19:9.3: Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana24.19:10.1: Nasaraṇaṃ narūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo rūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.19:10.2: Naaraṇaṃ narūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo rūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.19:10.4: Hetuyā dve, adhipatiyā dve … pe … aññamaññe ekaṃ … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate dve.
patthana24.19:11.1: Nasaraṇaṃ naarūpiṃ dhammaṃ paccayā saraṇo arūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.19:11.2: Nasaraṇaṃ naarūpiṃ dhammaṃ paccayā araṇo arūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.19:12.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nalokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.19:12.3: Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana24.19:13.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nalokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā araṇo lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.19:14.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nakenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.19:14.3: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana24.19:15.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nakenaci naviññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo kenaci naviññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.19:15.3: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
